meanings.definition: A type of igneous rock containing large crystals
meanings.sent1: The geologist studied the granophyres under a microscope.
meanings.sent2: The mountain was made of beautiful granophyres.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel tried to hide its acorn in the granophyres.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes sparkled like the crystals in the granophyres.
meanings.sent5: The sunlight reflected off the granophyres, creating a dazzling display.
